mapper.select: select v.id, v.title videoTitle, v.cover_path cover, v.video_path path, v.create_date uploadTime, v.brief description, c.catename cateName, u.headimg userPhoto from yx_video v left join yx_category c on v.category_id = c.id left join yx_user u on v.user_id = u.id order by v.create_date desc
